Articles.Content:
This one is normally for Nasa engineers. It is a slow motion of the departing shuttle. Those images are for analyses on the starting engines and launching sequence. You can find this same video with commentaries from Nasa. This one is with music that fits pretty well the game. Watch how the camera shutter must adapt to the light emitted by the engine. Impressive!

 

Also, there is this one. It's the Orion reentry with commentary and music. Also as beautiful. What amazed me was the color of the plasma trail at the peak heating. That purple is just astonishing. "There is your new spacecraft America!" Even if I'm from the other side of the pond, I completely was under the charm. Kudos 'muricans!
even tho ive seen these before, they are still awesome videos!
